text: @SpeakerPelosi @WHO How many countries have the Chinese COVID-19 virus Nancy. That is Senselessness!  Fund and organization that does not care about lives. That is senselessness..... so tell me - how are so many old people in Congress and the Senate and not one died from this?  Bunker Joe is hiding
